beers.description: Our American Pale Ale 5.5% Conditioned it upon fresh mint and lime juice, double dry hopped with Chinook.
beers.summary: Our American Pale Ale 5.5% Conditioned it upon fresh mint and lime juice, double dry hopped with Chinook.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #20. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #20. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of lime seltzer, brisk dryness, apricot marmalade, and a cyberstorm of lemongrass.
beers.description: Farmhouse Pale Ale. 6.4% brewed with spelt and oats. Aggressively hopped in the kettle with Azacca, Cascade and Columbus lupulin powder. Fermented in stainless with our magickal saison yeast. Dry hopped with Galaxy and Amarillo then keg conditioned with our favorite Champagne yeast.
beers.summary:
Farmhouse Pale Ale. 6.4% brewed with spelt and oats. Aggressively hopped in the kettle with Azacca, Cascade and Columbus lupulin powder. Fermented in stainless with our magickal saison yeast. Dry hopped with Galaxy and Amarillo then keg conditioned with our favorite Champagne yeast.
Notes of lime seltzer, brisk dryness, apricot marmalade, and a cyberstorm of lemongrass.

beers.notes: Notes of vanilla flowers, peach gummies, oyster crackers, and custard pie filling.
beers.description: Cream Ale. 5.4% Brewed with flaked corn. Hopped thoughtfully in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented and lagered for many moons in stainless steel.
beers.summary:
Cream Ale. 5.4% Brewed with flaked corn. Hopped thoughtfully in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented and lagered for many moons in stainless steel.
Notes of vanilla flowers, peach gummies, oyster crackers, and custard pie filling.

beers.notes: Notes of watermelon rind, blueberry, invigorating minerality, and sunny garden strolls.
beers.description: Rhubarb Dandelion Saison. 4.8% Brewed with spelt. Gently hopped with Melba, hibiscus and locally foraged Dandelion greens and flowers. Fermented for many moons with our magickal saison yeast atop house processed rhubarb puree. 10% of the proceeds of this beer will benefit Be the Match: The National Marrow Donor Program.
beers.summary:
Rhubarb Dandelion Saison. 4.8% Brewed with spelt. Gently hopped with Melba, hibiscus and locally foraged Dandelion greens and flowers. Fermented for many moons with our magickal saison yeast atop house processed rhubarb puree. 10% of the proceeds of this beer will benefit Be the Match: The National Marrow Donor Program.
Notes of watermelon rind, blueberry, invigorating minerality, and sunny garden strolls.

beers.notes: Notes of fuzzy stone fruit, peach rings, Valencia orange, and lemon curd.
beers.description: Apricot Farmhouse Ale. 5.2% Brewed with Pilsner malt and spelt. Hopped in the kettle with experimental hop #10419 and debittered Cascade. Fermented with a blend of our magickal saison yeast and our house hefeweizen yeast, then conditioned on copious amounts of apricot puree for many moons.
beers.summary:
Apricot Farmhouse Ale. 5.2% Brewed with Pilsner malt and spelt. Hopped in the kettle with experimental hop #10419 and debittered Cascade. Fermented with a blend of our magickal saison yeast and our house hefeweizen yeast, then conditioned on copious amounts of apricot puree for many moons.
Notes of fuzzy stone fruit, peach rings, Valencia orange, and lemon curd.

beers.notes: Notes of  Aperol spritzer, zippy zest, lemon balm, and cantaloupe.
beers.description: Corn IPA. 6.2% Brewed with malted corn from our pals at deer creek and fluffy oats. Hopped in the kettle with Chinook and Azzacca then Dry hopped with even more Chinook and Azzacca.
beers.summary:
Corn IPA. 6.2% Brewed with malted corn from our pals at deer creek and fluffy oats. Hopped in the kettle with Chinook and Azzacca then Dry hopped with even more Chinook and Azzacca.
Notes of  Aperol spritzer, zippy zest, lemon balm, and cantaloupe.

beers.notes: Notes of bright Meyer lemon, ripe star fruit, zippy green strawberry, and summer solstice.
beers.description: Cacao Fruit Berliner Weisse 5.5% Brewed with German Pilsner malt and wheat. Primary fermented with lactobacillus. Gently hopped in the kettle with Callista. Then conditioned on exotic cacao pod fruit.
beers.summary:
Cacao Fruit Berliner Weisse 5.5% Brewed with German Pilsner malt and wheat. Primary fermented with lactobacillus. Gently hopped in the kettle with Callista. Then conditioned on exotic cacao pod fruit.
Notes of bright Meyer lemon, ripe star fruit, zippy green strawberry, and summer solstice.
